info.description: A responsive image gallery component with customizable layouts, aspect ratios, and load more functionality

title.description: Section title displayed above the image gallery

subTitle.description: Optional subtitle displayed below the main title
subTitle.placeholder: Explore our collection of beautiful images

images.description: Collection of images to display. Images without links open in gallery modal, images with links navigate directly

desktopColumns.description: Number of columns to display on desktop screens (768px and above)

mobileColumns.description: Number of columns to display on mobile screens when using grid layout

mobileLayout.description: Layout type for mobile screens: slider shows one image at a time with navigation, grid shows multiple images in columns

desktopLayout.description: Layout type for desktop screens: slider shows configured columns with scrollable navigation, grid shows multiple images in columns

imageAspectRatio.description: Aspect ratio constraint for images: square (1:1), landscape (4:3), portrait (3:4), or auto (natural proportions)

gap.description: Spacing between images in the grid (in Tailwind spacing units)

lazyLoading.description: Controls when images are loaded for better performance

sliderLoop.description: Enable infinite loop for slider layouts only (mobile/desktop slider mode)
